original_text: For he says to Moses, “I will have mercy on whom I have mercy, and I will have compassion on whom I have compassion.”
korean_text: 모세에게 이르시되 내가 긍휼히 여길 자를 긍휼히 여기고 불쌍히 여길 자를 불쌍히 여기리라 하셨으니

sentences.original_text: I will have mercy on whom I have mercy,
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 긍휼히 여길 자를 긍휼히 여기고,

sentences.original_text: and I will have compassion on whom I have compassion.”
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 불쌍히 여길 자를 불쌍히 여기리라.”
